The claim was published on Facebook on A: 2020, and has been shared over 2,700 times.
The post includes an image of Sri Lankan: 3. The Sinhala caption below the photo translates to English as: “The World Health Organisation has declared the Sri Lanka Army as the world’s second best military force on emergency deployments.”
The WHO spokesperson for Sri Lanka confi: suggesting that the claim could be a misinterpretation of another achievement by the Sri Lanka Army in relation to emergency medical teams.
